"Mr. Umbra After The Rain!?":
"I recently had some business on Naberius
and after going there I can say that
the climate is incredibly wet!
Not only did it make me feel a bit depressed,
it also made my hair all curly...
I'm also a bit disheartened that none of
the Mr. Umbra rumors have panned out...
I wonder if there is some information anywhere?
*The Greenscape area when the weather is Heavy Rain or Thunderstorm"

"この間、惑星ナベリウスに
少し用事があって降り立ったんだけど
あの気候、すごいジメジメだよね！
なんか気分も落ち込み気味になるし
髪の毛もクルクル気味になりますよ……
Mr.アンブラが出現するっていう
噂も全部空振りでテンションダウン……
あー、他になにか情報はないかな～？？
※森林エリアの天候「大雨」か「雷雨」が対象"
